name: interlinked-artofstrategy-backend
description: Backend services for Interlinked Art of Strategy project - Python FastAPI with Agent Tool Architecture

scripts.dev: cd api && source venv/bin/activate && python main.py
scripts.start: cd api && source venv/bin/activate && python main.py
scripts.install-deps: cd api && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.test: cd api && source venv/bin/activate && python -m pytest

author: Interlinked Team
